description:
A world-class connection design software for concrete anchoring

DEWALT DESIGN ASSIST™ (DDA) is a no cost/no fee state-of-the-art structural design software that streamlines, automates, and optimizes your concrete anchoring design process. With multiple design standards to choose from, a comprehensive library of anchors, numerous reporting options, and a wide range of design tools, simplify your design process with DEWALT Design Assist.
This update introduces a new, secure sign-in process using Azure. All users - new and existing - will need to create a new account. Registration is quick and intuitive, and you’ll only need to sign in once every 90 days.
Please note: Your previous credentials (license key, password, security questions) will no longer work after this update. No project data will be lost - only the sign-in method is changing. Make sure you are connected to the internet before updating.
Click "Download" to download the latest version and begin the new registration process.
For help, contact dda@dewalt.com.
Bug Fixes and Enhancement Version: 1.7.7.0
- Upgraded user authentication system
  - All users (new and existing) will be required to create a new DDA account.
  - This transition improves security, enables future integration into DEWALT ID or single sign-on, and sets the foundation for a more connected DEWALT experience.
- Performance improvements
